display_long_description:
The scarecrows have come to life and are running away. 
You are the last line of defence. 
Become the guardian of the cornfield – you must be quick, accurate and have eyes in the back of your head 
to face the scarecrows without fear and defend the Cornline. It's like a return to the best days 
of retro gaming, but with a modern twist.

ScareCrow Hunting is a dynamic VR shooter where every second counts. Waves of scarecrows 
are advancing, and your accuracy, dexterity and cunning are the only things keeping them at bay. 
Eliminate your opponents with pistol shots, shower them with bullets using a rifle, 
or serve them a real bullet hell with a rocket launcher.


Be the best! 
Climb to the top of the leaderboard! Fight, shoot, be  the best defender of the cornfield in history! 

Modify and have fun 
Dozens of maps and different types of weapons! Choose gameplay modifications and beat your own records. 
It's the perfect game for short, intense sessions - solo or competing with friends at your 
next house party. Show them where fear lives!

Key features
- Precise VR action - rapid fire, shots under pressure, bullet hell
- Score attack - each wave is more difficult
- Unlockable content - new maps and weapons add
- Session modifications - crank up the risk, have fun, beat records
- Leaderboards - solid competition

Stylised, slightly surreal setting – a memorable atmosphere reminiscent of the best days of retro gaming.

Don't be intimidated! Join the battle and climb to the top of the leaderboard!
